com.snakybo.torch.input.joystick

Class JoystickDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.input.joystick.JoystickDevice

  • public final class JoystickDevice
extends java.lang.Object

    The JoystickDevice represents a single joystick or game controller.

    Input from the joystick is polled once every frame.

    Since:
    1.0
